# examples from the README


! moac-pwgen -z
stderr 'unknown option -z'
! stdout '.'

! moac-pwgen -P z
stderr 'invalid value for -P: z'
! moac-pwgen -t z
stderr 'invalid value for -t: z'
! stdout '.'

! moac-pwgen -L 3 ascii latin
stderr 'moac: bad length bounds: maxLen too short to use all available charsets'
! stdout '.'
